problem_statement: Build a Python 3.10+ feature store system that manages the complete ML feature lifecycle—from batch (PySpark) and real‑time (Kafka/Faust) computation to low‑latency serving via Redis—ensuring consistency between training and inference with point‑in‑time correct joins. Implement a PostgreSQL registry for feature definition and lineage, integrate Great Expectations for validation and MLflow for experiment tracking, and provide SDK support for pandas, PyTorch, and scikit‑learn. Package as a Python library with a REST API, offering unified feature definition, versioning, and serving for production ML workflows.
